4d714539-1697-4897-b9a1-a78f499c5250.description: A person with this badge understands different approaches to critical thinking; identifies and determines the relationships between variables to understand a system; draws logical conclusions based on data or claims; develops a strategy, theory, method, or argument based on a synthesis of evidence; judges the quality of procedures or solutions.
4d714539-1697-4897-b9a1-a78f499c5250.name: Critical Thinking - Excel Introductory 2021

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge students have earned a grade of 90% or higher on a Microsoft Office Application project and an assessment of critical thinking objectives.

99ddf743-dc1c-41e3-8a80-ae1b62938575.description: A person with this badge can create, navigate, format, and manage large worksheets and workbooks. They can organize, import, export, and cleanse data sets. This person can create tables and charts. They can link and analyze data with PivotTables and present this data visually through PivotCharts. They can save time by automating tasks with macros.
99ddf743-dc1c-41e3-8a80-ae1b62938575.name: Microsoft Excel 2021 Advanced

3af42c2a-344f-4131-94a8-e32953e4e6ce.description: Awarded to those who understand what a computer system is, the ethical issues of technology, and productivity software; they can evaluate hardware, CPU and memory function; use the Internet for research and evaluate the validity of content; understand a computer network; and understand hacking, viruses, and other threats to digital security. a0a548be-da96-4203-9483-47b37f6bd907.description: A person with this badge can design, customize, navigate, and manage large sets of data and databases. They can create tables, queries, forms, and reports. This person can exchange data between Access and other applications. 390b174b-1e48-49bb-a34e-e18312b384d2.description: A person with this badge can identify and describe computer parts, and their features and functions; describe a computer network and the features of a desktop; identify current and future computer trends; understands the importance of file management, system utilities, and backups; recognize threats to security and privacy as well as troubleshoot computer problems and perform routine maintenance; and they can evaluate different types of software and licenses.
390b174b-1e48-49bb-a34e-e18312b384d2.name: GO! All in One - Digital Competency

40eb3f31-cbae-4351-952b-1d0f8ff73afb.description: A person with this badge understands why the web is so important in today's society; search for and evaluate information on the web; manage their digital footprint, and use digital communication tools; select the appropriate tool for business applications, as well as use Google Tools, Microsoft Cloud tools, and OneNote; use Windows 10 to search for and manage files and folders and copy and move files and folders.
